casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jennifer JIMENEZ/April Myers 22P19-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 April Myers, for Jimenez, Jennifer. Craig Blitzer, District Attorney, for State.

*159The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of April 2019 by Defendant to Proceed as Indigent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
